overview: Truckdriver Dusty Rhoades leads a team of truckers over dangerous roads to deliver emergency supplies before a crucial dam breaks.
tagline: For the sake of a girl whose dad despised racers, he swore off speed cars and went to boosting trucks. Only to get himself and dad arrested. A girl; the cops; a storm; a bursted dam; and a soul-stirring race against death.
title: What's Your Hurry?
